result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

charges.descr: Resist Officer - Substantial Bodily Harm/Soft Tissue Injury

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Luis A Fuentes Ramos

records.addlTxt: No contact with AAG or residence on Hillcrest Rd in Saukville. Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. Absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants. Defendant to avoid the victim's residence and/or any location temporarily occupied by the victim. The defendant avoid contacting the victim or causing any person other than a party's attorney or law enforcement officer to contact the victim. Contact includes: contact at victim's home, work, school, public places, in person, by phone, in writing, by electronic communication or device, or in any other manner.

2:14 PM Cases called: 22CF211/22CF390 Defendant Luis A Fuentes Ramos appeared by video from the Ozaukee County jail, in custody.  Attorney Julius Andriusis appeared by video for Luis A Fuentes Ramos.  Prosecuting attorney Kristian Kanekoa Lindo in court for the State of Wisconsin. Spanish Interpreter 243621, via phone, sworn. Court reviews case history. State recommends $25,000 cash bail on each case. Counsel waives time limits and requests status.
Status hearing scheduled for November 8, 2022 at 01:15 pm.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: Per Dispatch, subject in custody on warrant
Copy of warrant emailed to Sheriffnotice

Judge Williams sitting in for Judge Malloy, Spanish interpreter, John Vaughn present in court. 10:16 AM Prosecuting attorney Antonella Aleman-Zientek in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Luis A Fuentes Ramos not in court.  Attorney Julius Andriusis in court for Luis A Fuentes Ramos. Counsel advising his client reached out to him and did not have a ride this morning. Based on defendant's non appearance, court forfeits bail and issues warrant.
8:43am Caller identified as defendant indicates he is unable to get a ride to court this morning and has been trying to contact his attorney Julius Andriusis. Clerk emailed clerk advising of same.

records.descr: Application for specific judicial assign approved

records.addlTxt: No contact with: Victim listed in complaint or residence on West Hillcrest Rd, Saukville, WI. Absolute sobriety.  No possession/consumption of any intoxicants. Not to possess or consume controlled substances or prescription medication w/out a valid prescription. Not to operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license.

1:08 PM Prosecuting attorney Kerra Stumbris in court for the State of Wisconsin.  Defendant Luis A Fuentes Ramos appeared by video, in custody at the Ozaukee County Jail.  Attorney Heather Dvoran in court for Luis A Fuentes Ramos. Spanish Interpreter #260273 sworn in. Counsel acknowledges receipt of complaint, waives reading. Counsel advises Defendant will be retaining an Attorney. Court finds probable cause. State requesting $5000 cash bail with conditions. Court finds good cause to extend any time limits and set case for status on prelim hearing.
Status hearing scheduled for July 19, 2022 at 08:15 am.
